mapper.insert: INSERT INTO OPER_VC ( ID, PARENTID, REMARK, NAME, VALID, EDITABLE, CREATEDATE, VIRTUALCENTERKEY ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{remark}, #{name}, #{valid}, #{editAble}, #{createDate}, #{virtualCenterKey} )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM OPER_VC WHERE
AND ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE OPER_VC TVC
VALID = #{valid,javaType=boolean},
PARENTID = #{parentId,javaType=java.lang.String},
REMARK = #{remark,javaType=java.lang.String},
NAME = #{name,javaType=java.lang.String},
VIRTUALCENTERKEY = #{virtualCenterKey,javaType=com.tx.component.operator.model.VirtualCenterEnum}
WHERE TVC.ID = #{id} AND EDITABLE = 1
